BasicInfo.short: Smule is a developer of interactive sonic applications for the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Products.name: I Am T-Pain
Products.description: I Am T-Pain is an iPhone App that allows users to auto-tune their voices like famous performing artists T-Pain, Akon and more.
